Label: Route1P2TextString1
Japanese:
まあ　かわいらしい　トレーナーやこと
うちと　ポケモン　しはります？
English:
What a lovely
trainer you are!
Won't you partake
in a battle?

Label: Route1P2TextString2
Japanese: いやあ　かんにんやわあ

Label: Route1P2TextString3
Japanese:
かわいい　かおして　つよおすなあ
その　ちょうしで　おきばりやす
English:
You look cute, but
you truly don't
hold back! You'll
strain yourself
like that.

Japanese:
シゲル『おっ　サトシじゃないか！

なんとか　ここまで　これた
って　かんじだな

じつりょくが　ないのに
むり　するなよな

もっと　ポケモン　あつめるとか
いろんな　ポケモン　そだてるとか
やること　あるだろ？

ここで　ひきかえしたほうが　いいぜ！
じゃあな
English:
GARY: Oh! If it
isn't ASH!

Guess you actually
made it all the
way here.
Even though you're
a wimp! Don't push
yourself, huh?

You've got your
work cut out for
you, don'tcha?
Like catching more
#MON, or
raising lotsa
different types
of #MON.

You should turn
back here! See ya!

Label: Route1P2TextString5

ここは　１ばん　どうろ
